description: El Jimador Reposado is a 100% agave tequila that is aged for 2 months in American oak barrels. The tequila is made from the finest hand-selected blue agave plants, which are baked in brick ovens and then crushed using a tahona stone wheel. The juice is then fermented in stainless steel tanks and distilled in copper pot stills.  El Jimador Reposado is a smooth, well-balanced tequila with a hint of vanilla and oak.

Los Jacinto Espadin is mezcal made from 100% agave Espadin. The agave is cooked in a traditional clay oven and then crushed using a tahona stone wheel. The juice is then fermented in stainless steel tanks and distilled in copper pot stills.  Los Jacinto Espadin is a smooth, well-balanced mezcal with a hint of vanilla and oak.
